p: so basically the idea was: user goes onto that website, downloads mp3, records a video of him/herself dancing to it and then uploads it. once its uploaded, other users can view and "luv" those videos.

biggest pain in the ass was converting all the different formats that come in, into all the different formats needed for showing it in all the different browsers. so many edgecases and conversion tools.
in the end we made it work and its awesome.
